data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sruoga, Virginijus, Sinev, Sergey Yu., Rocienė, Agnė (2017): The Elachistidae (Lepidoptera: Gelechioidea) of Caucasus, with description of three new species. Zootaxa 4338 (2): 241-262, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.2.2|60 occurrences
